long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The EVER best "kaomoji" extension you can get. (◍'‿'◍) ٩◔̯◔۶ ᕕ( ཀ ʖ̯ ཀ)ᕗ
This extension includes PREMIUM kaomoji and Japanese Emoticons that you have never used.
***One click copy and paste function***
If you are a true kaomoji fan then this extension is for you. (❋⊙‿⊙❋)
Japanese emoticons can be used while chatting and commenting on post's and video's, kaomoji makes the chat more interesting and engaging.
֎(ˇ‿ˇ)֎    V✪⋏✪V   (✖﹏✖)   ༼☯﹏☯༽   (❣•‿•❣)   (✺ᵔ‿ᵔ✺)   ◉‿◉   └(・。・)┘
